os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: 32-bit MS Windows (95/98)

name: Set4
short_description:
Set4 is a special Symbolic Editor especially for Maths. It has Paper Generation Capacity From a Supplied Huge Knowledge Base.
 There are many Math Editors but they lack Paper Generator Capacity. On the other hand any question paper generator will depend upon third party document editors to input questions. Set4 is stand alone editor capable of creating all types of text including polished mathematics contents and diagrams. 

Create a database of questions or database of Mathematics Problems for multipurpose long term use through Set4.

Set4 can generate question paper (with answers if you input) from this database within seconds. You can create your own patterns. Save patterns. Reuse them. It can prepare tutorial sheets and transparencies. It can be used for classroom display on projector or LCD. Set4 can search the database of problems.

My other projects :.

http://sourceforge.net/projects/collegetimetable
http://sourceforge.net/projects/marklist
summary: Set4 is Editor and Question Paper Generator for Teachers and Students.
